rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0001
rows.name:
Ahh, I love this!
The feeling of openness here.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0002
rows.name:
Now this is freedom!
Makes you feel truly alive...

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0003
rows.name:
What are you on about?
You're always free to do
whatever you please.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0004
rows.name:
Come on, are you blind?
What part of this
looks like freedom to you?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0005
rows.name:
Everywhere we go it's group activities,
and on top of that
I'm babysitting Nopon and kids?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0006
rows.name:
You're doing it because you want to,
right?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm definitely not doing it
because I want to!
It's because I have no other option!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0008
rows.name: Gahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0009
rows.name:
Despite that,
you always look like you're having fun!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0010
rows.name:
Your vision must be clouded
if that's what you see!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0011
rows.name:
Zantetsu,
you're quite chatty today.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0012
rows.name:
Zantetsu,
you're talking a lot today.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0013
rows.name:
Zantetsu,
you're quite eloquent today, aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0014
rows.name:
Zantetsu,
you're mighty talkative today, ain't ya?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0015
rows.name:
Hm, am I?
I guess I'm in a good mood today.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0016
rows.name:
Despite how I seem, I'm usually
very considerate of those around me,
you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0017
rows.name:
You're hardly considerate!
You just wander off by yourself
all the time.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0018
rows.name:
You've always got something to
shout back at me, haven't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0019
rows.name: Woooaahh!!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0020
rows.name: Let's ask Zantetsu something.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0021
rows.name:
Do you dislike being
considerate of others?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0022
rows.name: Why do you prefer being alone?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0023
rows.name: Let's ask Zantetsu something.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0024
rows.name:
Do you hate having to
be mindful of others?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0025
rows.name: Why do you prefer being alone?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0026
rows.name: Let's ask Zantetsu.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0027
rows.name: Do you hate caring for others?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0028
rows.name: Why do you prefer being by yourself?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0029
rows.name: Let's ask Zantetsu something.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0030
rows.name:
Do ya dislike bein'
considerate of others?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0031
rows.name: Why are ya wanderin' around alone?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0101
rows.name:
Well, I've never really
liked being in groups.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0102
rows.name: I'd like to live freely on my own.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0103
rows.name:
If we left you alone,
who knows what you'd do.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0104
rows.name:
It's for the best that your Driver
keeps you in check.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0105
rows.name: Heh, look who's talking.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0106
rows.name:
You're the one who'd be causing
chaos everywhere if we left
you to your own devices!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0107
rows.name:
Waaaah!
You wouldn't do that!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0108
rows.name:
Ahaha, despite what you say,
you two get along well.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0109
rows.name:
Haha, you two may bicker,
but you're actually good friends,
aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0110
rows.name:
Hehe...You two are truly
good friends, aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0111
rows.name:
Whatever ya say,
you two are buddies, ain't ya?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0112
rows.name:
What?
Don't be ridiculous!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0113
rows.name:
There's no way I'd get along
with someone like this!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0114
rows.name:
That's the one thing we agree on!
I'd prefer the company of an Igna!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0115
rows.name:
Who are you calling an Igna,
you Gogol-faced jerk!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0116
rows.name:
Woooaah!
I'm stronger than a Gogol!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0117
rows.name: Oh. Whatever you say.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0118
rows.name:
Anyway,
I'm going to keep doing as I please.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0119
rows.name:
As long as I don't get sick of
this place, I'll keep lending
you all my assistance.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0120
rows.name: Don't let me down, Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0201
rows.name:
Being by myself is just easier.
Less hassle, more freedom.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0202
rows.name:
Besides, "lone wolf" sounds
pretty cool, don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0203
rows.name:
You're a Blade.
There's no way you could
live on your own.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0204
rows.name: I'm aware of that...

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0205
rows.name:
Do you feel like we're
holding you back somehow?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0206
rows.name: Are we constraining you somehow?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0207
rows.name:
Is it possible we are
restricting your freedom?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0208
rows.name:
Are we the ones
holdin' ya back?

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0209
rows.name:
What?
No, that's not what I meant!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0210
rows.name: Why are you getting all gloomy about it!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0211
rows.name: Look, I don't mind being with all of you.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0212
rows.name:
And I don't feel like you're
holding me back or anything.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0213
rows.name:
If I'm being honest,
I actually enjoy hanging out
with you all...

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0214
rows.name:
It's just that, like Ootsuchi said,
I can't live without a Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0215
rows.name:
That's why I find myself
longing for independence.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0216
rows.name: That's all I meant.

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0217
rows.name:
You guys don't need to worry about it!
Got it?!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0218
rows.name:
Gahaha!
Zantetsu, you're such a character!!

rows.label: kizunatalk052_msg0219
rows.name:
Shut up!
Mind your own business!
